title: CSS 342: Data Structures and Algorithms I Projects
subtitle: Comprehensive C++ projects on class design, recursion, templates, sorting, and data structures
description: A portfolio of C++ projects completed for CSS 342 focusing on advanced programming concepts including class design with operator overloading, recursive algorithms, templated linked lists, sorting algorithm analysis, and a transaction-driven banking system with queues and binary search trees. Projects demonstrate solid object-oriented programming and algorithmic problem-solving skills.
